channel.title: Tops on Katherine's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Katherine's Blog

item.description: My GitHub chart: Hello beautiful people! Thanks for being interested in finding out about me :). I consider myself as a future poet, next-generation Oscar Wilde (or NoÃ«l Coward maybe) and comedian with healing power and so on (well, we all have dreams right?). But somehow, I am currently doing Ph.D. research in the area of statistical/machine learning and econometrics. This website is mainly a tech blog, so it’s going to be all about my research (referring to some keywords I did not expect when I was a kid :P.
